attributes.review:
This app is horribly horrible,

I downloaded this app the get updates from the president but, this app immediately put a lot of internet bugs on my phone. Not to mention the fact that it glitched every second and had no updates and gave me an a large number of notifications even though i had no updates. DO NOT get this app unless you want to go get your phone fixed. I had to pay a good deal of money because my phone couldnâ€™t take the racism!
attributes.title: lamentable app

attributes.review: I downloaded the app this morning and when I did there was a strange noise from my tv upstairs. When I went to investigate there was a slideshow of Donald j trump playing and I couldnâ€™t remove it from my tv. Then my air conditioner went full blast at the lowest setting and my temperature was at 0 degrees and turned it my house into an ice box. The garage door kept opening and closing as well and my speaker system blasted the National anthem at 100% volume. This app caused my smart home to go haywire and it needs to be taken down ASAP.
